name: Another fishing game
description:
You play as Jack, a pirate who has lost his entire crew after a shipwreck.
He decides to go into the fishing business, which is just as lucrative and much safer.
A wise old man told him that there were seven very rare fish fish lurking in the abysses of the ocean... 

This is my second game jam :)

* I still don't know how to properly render my HTML game on itch...
